project.name: EL4J
project.description: EL4J, the Extension Library for the J2EE, adds incremental improvements to the Spring Java framework (http://www.springframework.org/).

repository.name: External release repository of the EL4J project
Internal release repository of the EL4J project

pluginRepository.name: External release repository of the EL4J project
External snapshot repository of the EL4J project

properties.javadoc.header: <script type='text/javascript'>function removeKeyword(str) { i = str.indexOf(':'); str = str.substring(i+1); i = str.length; str = str.substring(0, i-1); return str; } function removeHead (str) { v=str.substring(47); return v.substring(0, v.length-2); } function printFileStatus (url_kw, revision_kw, date_kw, author_kw) { document.write ('<br/><dl><dt><b>File-location:</b></dt><dd><a href="http://el4j.svn.sourceforge.net/viewvc/'); document.write(removeHead(url_kw)); document.write('">'); document.write(removeHead(url_kw)); document.write('</a></dd></dl>'); document.write('<dl><dt><b>Last check-in date </b>'); document.write(removeKeyword(date_kw)); document.write('<b> by </b>'); document.write(removeKeyword(author_kw)); document.write('<b> for revision </b>'); document.write(removeKeyword(revision_kw)); document.write('</dt></dl>'); } </script>
